title: Victorinox Stories - The Compliment
description:
Cologne (Germany), 2010

How a waitress was able to deal successfully with a dissatisfied customer thanks to his Victorinox fragrance: 
http://www.victorinox.com

asset.author: Victorinox AG
asset.hookText:
Cologne (Germany), 2010

How a waitress was able to deal successfully with a dissatisfied customer thanks to his Victorinox fragrance: 
http://www.victorinox.com

transcripts: During the break fist shift at a design convention in cologne. The restaurant had a brisk air of coming and going as a young professional still conducting my training I had my hands full. A guest from Spain was very unhappy when he arrived. Since all of the other tables will fall I had to consult with him. Later he complained to audibly about the coffee I normally can't stand to guests like him but he was different not because he had striking Mediterranean looks but instead because he smelt really good which I told him. He then became really nice and talkative. He said people kept giving him the same compliment. Shortly after leaving he came back to the restaurant and gave me a lovely little bottle of his perf you're from Victoria Knox is gived still often reminds me of how just a little gesture can turn a bad day to good.
